## Description {#details}

Collect information about induction variables that are used by sign/zero extend operations.

This information is recorded by CollectExtend and provides the input to WidenIV.

Definition at line 71 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/utils/simplifyindvar-h">SimplifyIndVar.h</a>.
